dict.string:
if [[ "$TM_APACHE_DIRECTORY" == "" ]]; then
if [[ -d "/etc/apache2" ]]; then TM_APACHE_DIRECTORY="/etc/apache2" else [[ -d "/etc/httpd" ]]; then TM_APACHE_DIRECTORY="/etc/httpd" fi fi
if [[ -f "$TM_APACHE_DIRECTORY/httpd.conf" ]]; then
open -a TextMate "$TM_APACHE_DIRECTORY/httpd.conf"
else
exit_show_tool_tip "http.conf not located."
fi
